name: Chamber Shift
description:
BenBonk Game Jam #2 submission

Theme: Limited Space

Chamber Shift is a 2D Platformer where the room size changes based on movements!

Using W, Space, or the Up Arrow, will perform a jump, which will shrink the room, bringing the walls towards the center. These walls differ in speed. Using A or the left arrow,  undo's this effect. Get the key and hop onto the door to progress!

Everything made in 2 days by

Phamility, https://twitter.com/TheAgileIndie
